author: "Nobukuni Hyakutake"
date: "2023-10-06"
date-format: "iso"
categories: [Python]
image: "mountain2.jpeg"
---

![](mountain2.jpeg)

## 数の入力

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
0x10
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=16}
```
16
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
1.23e5
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=17}
```
123000.0
```
:::
:::


## 簡単な計算

::: {.cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
2*3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=18}
```
6
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
10/3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=19}
```
3.3333333333333335
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
10//3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=20}
```
3
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
10%3
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=21}
```
1
```
:::
:::


## 変数

::: {.cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
x=2
y=3
x*y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=22}
```
6
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
x,y=20,30
x*y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=23}
```
600
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
x=1+1
x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=24}
```
2
```
:::
:::


## 文字列

::: {.cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_s='abcde'
len(my_s)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25}
```
5
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
'This is' ' a' ' pen.'
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26}
```
'This is a pen.'
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
'This is'+' a'+' pen.'
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27}
```
'This is a pen.'
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=13}
``` {.python .cell-code}
my_s[1:4]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28}
```
'bcd'
```
:::
:::


::: {.cell execution_count=14}
``` {.python .cell-code}
tmp="{} is {}"
tmp.format('This', 'a pen')
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=29}
```
'This is a pen'
```
:::
:::


## 参考文献

[ゼロからはじめるデータサイエンス入門](https://www.kspub.co.jp/book/detail/5132326.html)

## Python version

::: {.cell execution_count=15}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import platform
"Python version "+platform.python_version()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30}
```
'Python version 3.10.7'
```
:::
:::
